name: don't pee on the floor
description:
just as you walk home, you hear a bolt from behind, after a couple of hours you wake up inside a set of walls with no way out, you have an exaggerated need for a toilet, given your indominable spill of piss. but from afar you hear a particular voice. find the toilet and don't piss on the floor
